title: Week 4 Day 2 #LCS discussion
body:
[Link to day 1 discussion](http://community.na.leagueoflegends.com/c/esports/vuqlb9Uq-week-4-day-1-lcs-discussion)


---
[Today's schedule](http://na.lolesports.com/schedule/2014-02-03) - watch at lolesports.com

[**SK** *(4-6)* vs.** CHW** *(4-6)*](http://na.lolesports.com/eu-lcs/2014/split1/matches/week-4/sk-gaming-vs-copenhagen-wolves-0)

[**SHC.XD** *(3-7)* vs. **Gambit** *(7-2)*](http://na.lolesports.com/eu-lcs/2014/split1/matches/week-4/supa-hot-crew-vs-gambit-gaming)

[**Fnatic** *(7-2)* vs. **ROCCAT** *(6-3)*](http://na.lolesports.com/eu-lcs/2014/split1/matches/week-4/fnatic-vs-roccat)

[**Alliance** *(3-6)* vs. **Millenium** *(3-6)*](http://na.lolesports.com/eu-lcs/2014/split1/matches/week-4/alliance-vs-millenium)

Discuss the matches, picks, bans and more below!
---

**Notes** - Blue text indicates a link. When the games are finished I will link the picks and end game stats from lolesports.com. Don't click them unless you've watched the game or want to be spoiled!

replies.body: SHC is destroying Gambit. This game is so exciting!!
Yeah they are! I wasn't expecting this at all. :p Looks like I'm going to be 1-1 after this game.
My picks for today - Wolves, Gambit, Fnatic and Alliance
Yep. Im wiht you on that one.
Alright, special thanks to Bear Hat Alice for being the only contributor! :p The games were fun for me, at least.
